PerfectNetExp.abs: forefend vt挡开;避开;防止;保护forfend vt挡开;避开;防止;保护D
防避的英... ... 5.为防避台风，他提前离开了这个城市。 He left the city to avoid the hurricane. 防避 ： forfend 防避 ： Warding.
May God forfend such an unhappy fate !, 愿神能挡开这样的不幸命运.

list.abs: lord-英汉词典... ... Lord forbid 但愿不会如此,千万不要这样,苍天不容 Lord forfend 但愿不会如此,千万不要这样,苍天不容.
May God forfend such an unhappy fate !, 愿神能挡开这样的不幸命运.

jx.jx_en_mean: (archaic or humorous)used to express dismay or horror at the thought of something happening
jx.jx_cn_mean: (古 或 幽默)但愿不会如此，苍天不容（表示惊愕或恐惧）

lj.lj_ly: God forfend that we should ever allow the media to tell us how to run our business.
lj.lj_ls: 让媒体告诉我们如何经营？天哪，千万不要这样！。

auth_sentence.content: I mean, heaven forfend they might simply be mates and his blindness just isn't an issue.
auth_sentence.res_content: I mean, heaven forfend they might simply be mates and his blindness just isn't an issue.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I mean, heaven forfend they might simply be mates and his blindness just isn't an issue.

auth_sentence.content: Heaven forfend one of their heels snagged the ultra-luxurious fabrics as they hastened to change.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Heaven forfend one of their heels snagged the ultra-luxurious fabrics as they hastened to change.
